actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to facilitate fresh pursuit of criminals in the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Authorizes the fresh pursuit into the District of Columbia by any member of a duly organized peace unit in order to arrest a person believed to have committed a criminal offense (now felony). (Amends D.C.C. 23-901-903)

titles.title: A bill to facilitate fresh pursuit of criminals in the District of Columbia.
